PROPOSED CUTS BY PRESIDENT VERSUS THE BUDGET PASSED BY CONGRESS

Percent Change in 2018 Funding from Enacting 2017 Funding, By Department or Agency

Source: Congressional Budget Office; Office of Management and Budget, 2018
content.question: Which of the following statements about the relationship between Congress and the executive branch is best illustrated by the bar chart?

choices.label: The budget process shows how the president is able control the policy agenda of Congress.
The executive departments are able to use discretionary power to increase their funding.
The budget process enables Congress to check the power of the executive branch.
The executive departments operate independently of congressional oversight.

content.answer: The budget process enables Congress to check the power of the executive branch.
